title: 3 bed/1bath First floor flat! Available for August.
posting_body: ['Email me today to schedule a viewing or for more information.', 'There are still tenants there.', 'By appointments only Thanks!', 'Availability for showings are for Thursday and Friday by appointments only.', 'ASK ABOUT MY SPECIAL TODAY!', 'Convenient to public transportation!', 'Tasty Restaurants, USF, Walking distance to Golden Gate Park!', 'Nice & Spacious!', '*Lots of natural sunlight', '*3 bed, 1 bath 1st floor.', '*Shared Laundry room.', '*Bright living room', '*Approximately 1000 sq.ft', 'All appliances included:', '- Washer/Dryer in building', 'Refrigerator, Gas stove', '-Located near Golden Gate Park, Ocean Beach, and Shopping mall', '- Easy access to public transportation', '- Spacious living room', '- Plenty of natural light', '- Cable and Internet Ready', '- Term: 1 year lease', 'Subject to credit and rental history:', '*Security Deposit: tbd 1 to 1.5 months rent', '*Tenant pays for utilities.', '*Credit history of all residing adults will be checked.', '(Renter pays the nominal credit check fee $40)', '*Available for move in for August.', 'Will Show by appointments only.', 'Please email me or text me for inquiries Thanks!', 'Happy house hunting!']
